name: Muktaa Charitable Foundation
briefDescription: Muktaa Charitable Foundation, a public trust, formed by socially conscious citizens, runs Samvad HIV/AIDS Helpline.Started with a mission of making a visible impact in the field of HIV,"Samvad H I V H e l p l i n e" came into existence on 2ndv October 2005,till date Samvad has handled more than 90,000 calls,some of these were life saving for the callers.
